name: Cryptoman, bomberman inspired multiplayer
description:
Cryptoman is a multi-blockchain multi-player game, where you gain crypto by blowing up other players. To do so, you need to put your own life at risk. You can earn lives in the game itself by playing as ghost, or purchase them with your favorite cryptocurrency.

Additionally, we host special events such as tournaments and treasure hunts. Check out the event / tournament section for current information.
